<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create MP role for the unit. The roles created this way are used for [[Join In Progress]] and [[Team Switch]]. 

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value> <template><title>Warning </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Doesn't work as intended - does currently nothing in <template><title>arma3</title></template>.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setPlayable''' unitName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setPlayable]] _aPerson</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
